elements.text: You are a dog owner. You've had difficulty with your balance lately, and you worry that it will become harder to take your dog for a walk. Thinking about whether you will be able to continue to care for your dog makes you feel...

elements.name: Future Dog Walking_Early/Mid-Stage Symptoms_puzzle1
